features.additionalInfo: You can have more than one card linked to an account.
You can use BPAY to quickly and easily pay your bills online.
You can set up direct debits.

Have easy access to your money with a Debit Mastercard. It's available to Australian citizens and temporary or permanent residents over 16 with an Australian residential address (limited exceptions may apply subject to conditions).

Deposit at least $4,000 a month into your account and you'll be eligible for a Platinum Debit Mastercard, which includes upgraded benefits like complimentary purchase security and extended warranty on Australian purchases. Limitations, exclusions and eligibility criteria apply. It's available to Australian citizens and temporary or permanent residents over 18 with an Australian residential address (limited exceptions may apply subject to conditions). Bankwest is making changes to the Platinum Debit Mastercard Insurances. On 25 July 2022 the Platinum Debit Card Extended Warranty and Purchase Security insurances will be withdrawn. Purchases made on or after 25 July 2022 will no longer be available for cover. Eligible purchases made in accordance with the Purchase Security and Extended Warranty Insurances in place from 29 September 2021 to 24 July 2022 will still be eligible for cover.
Access your money with a Bankwest Debit Card.
Bank on the go with the Bankwest App. Use Bankwest Online Banking (BOB) to access your money and manage your everyday banking.

If you want to access your account in Online Business Banking, you will be provided with a separate Product Disclosure Statement and your use of the service will be a matter of separate agreement with us. Separate fees are applicable for this service.
Use Apple Pay for a smart, secure and easy way to pay from your Apple device.
Use Google Pay from any compatible Android device to tap and pay on the go.
Set up Easy Alerts through the Bankwest App to get notified about important account activity.
Get paid faster and easier by transferring funds using your mobile number and email address instead of your BSB and account number.
Get paid faster and easier by sending your mobile number and email address instead of your BSB and account number.
Over the counter transactions available at Bankwest branches.
You can bank over the phone.
You can open up to 10 Bankwest Easy Transaction accounts to bucket your money, nickname them and shuffle their priority and set goals in the Bankwest App.
Cheque access is available.
Backed by Mastercard 24/7 Zero Liability Protection.
Other fees which the Bank charges for its services, including services not specific to this account but for which you may be charged are listed in our Bankwest Your Guide to Banking Fees brochure.
You can set up ongoing payments for things like bills or loan repayments.

constraints.additionalInfo: No minimum deposit required to open the account.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Bankwest Easy Transaction Account is an account for personal customers who are over 11 years of age. You can apply online if you're 16 or over, or in a branch from age 11.
The Bankwest Easy Transaction Account is an account for personal customers who are over 11 years of age. You can apply online if you're 16 or over, or in a branch from age 11.
A maximum of two account holders is permitted on the account.
There is a limit of ten accounts per person, whether as a single or joint account holder.

fees.name: Cheque Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No cheque withdrawal fees apply to this product.

fees.name: Electronic Withdrawal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No electronic withdrawal fees apply to this product.

fees.name: Honour Fee - Personal
fees.additionalInfo: A $10.00 Honour Fee will apply when one or more transactions overdraw the account, Bankwest elects to honour (pay) the transaction(s), and Bankwest does not issue an Overdrawn Notice. A transaction will be taken to overdraw your account if it causes the balance to exceed the funds available in your account.

fees.name: Overseas ATM Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Overseas ATM access fee. The overseas bank may charge a fee for using their ATM. Other fees and charges, including foreign transaction fees, may apply.

fees.name: Outward Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A $10.00 Outward Dishonour Fee will be charged to the account where Bankwest dishonours (does not pay) a transaction because there are insufficient funds available in your account (including funds available under a Safety Net Facility) to cover the amount of a cheque drawn on your account, periodical payment or other authorised debit request made in respect of your account. Bankwest will only charge one Outward Dishonour Fee per account, per day.

fees.name: Counter Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No counter fees apply to this product.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Customers with this account will receive eStatements via Bankwest Online Banking and the Bankwest App. Customers who opt to receive a paper statement, however, may be charged the Paper Statement fee. Exemptions apply.

fees.name: Cheque Stop Payment
fees.additionalInfo: Fee to stop payment on an issued cheque. This fee is $25 when payment is stopped on a range of cheques.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Foreign transactions are transaction occurring outside of Australia whether in foreign currency or Australian dollars including if you are in Australia (for example, online) where the merchant or the financial institution or entity processing the transaction is located overseas.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Variable Overdraft Reference Rate. Applies to any overdrawn amount.

data.name: Easy Transaction Account
data.description: Our low fee bank account has no monthly maintenance fees and no ATM fees at 10,000 major bank ATMs Australia-wide.
